text: Youth is the second Japanese studio album and third studio album overall by South Korean boy band BTS, which was released on September 7, 2016. The album features 13 tracks. ==Editions== Both versions have the complete track listing and a photocard came with all first edition albums. * * * Album + DVD edition (PCCA-4434): This edition comes with a DVD containing "For You", "I Need You (Japanese version)", and "Run (Japanese version)" music videos. *Regular edition (PCCA-4435): N/A ==Commercial performance== The album sold 44,547 on the first day of its release, and charted 1st in Oricon Daily Album Chart. The album was eventually certified Gold with sales of roughly over 100,000 in Japan. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Chart !Peak position |- |Japan Oricon Daily Album Chart | align="center" | 1 |- |Japan Oricon Weekly Album Chart | align="center" | 1 |- |} == Sales and certifications == ==Release history== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Country ! Date ! Format ! title: Youth (BTS album)
